name: David W. KNAUER, Appellant, v. Edward SALTER

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDER-MOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: David W. KNAUER, Appellant, v. Edward SALTER.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Order affirmed.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: David W. Knauer, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Mark E. Garber, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
482 A.2d 1277
David W. KNAUER, Appellant, v. Edward SALTER.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 24, 1984.
Decided Nov. 7, 1984.
David W. Knauer, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Mark E. Garber, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDER-MOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
